content.question: In order to support the immense weight of the Pantheon's dome, Roman imperial architects used

choices.label: eight massive piers to distribute the weight of the dome evenly
a thick-walled rotunda on which the coffered dome rests
corbeling, by arranging the dome's stone blocks in circular courses cantilevered inward
pendentives, curved triangular vaults located between the dome and the supporting arches

content.answer: a thick-walled rotunda on which the coffered dome rests

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
